h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Mother of Stones
content: Rest up, and then return to the Man-in-Stone. You may want to also clear out the Bladebones above him just so they don’t harass you as you try to turn in the Stone Essence.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Squall Hideout' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Mother of Stones'.
The content is as follows:
Rest up, and then return to the Man-in-Stone. You may want to also clear out the Bladebones above him just so they don’t harass you as you try to turn in the Stone Essence.
